doc:
Marcel Perez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcel_Perez 0 Marcel Perez, born Marcel Fernández Peréz (January 29, 1884 – February 8, 1929), was an internationally celebrated Spanish-born creator and star of over 200 silent comedy short subjects. He directed himself in nearly two-thirds of these films, acting, on two continents under such names as Marcel Fabre, Michel Fabre, Fernandea Perez, Manuel Fernández Pérez, Robinet, Tweedy, Tweedledum, and Twede-Dan. Marcel_Perez , born Marcel_Fernández_Peréz ( January_29_,_1884 – February_8_,_1929 ) , was an_internationally_celebrated_Spanish-born_creator_and_star of over_200_silent_comedy_short_subjects . He directed himself in nearly_two-thirds of these_films , acting , on two_continents under such_names as Marcel_Fabre , Michel_Fabre , Fernandea_Perez , Manuel_Fernández_Pérez , Robinet , Tweedy , Tweedledum , and Twede-Dan .
